title: Amadeus : distribution market share 2010 to 2019
summary: In general Market share has rose over the Year.
Market share is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2013, and finally roughly constant from 2013 to 2014.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2012 and 2013.
Maximum Market share, about 40.7 was reported at Year 2014
Minimum Market share about 36.7 was reached at Year 2010
min_summary: Overall Market share has increased over the Year.
Market share is slightly increasing from 2010 to 2013, and finally roughly constant from 2013 to 2014.
